about_the_game:
The S13 that started Adams amazing car journey.
After making a name for himself in BMX, Adam saved up to purchase his first drift car in 2015. A SR20DET Cream S13.
The car has since amassed a huge following through Adams progress videos building the car to an impressive 480HP.
